verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when he <S%H8138>changed<s%> his <S%H2940>behaviour<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech;<s%> who <S%H1644>drove<s%> him away, and he <S%H3212>departed.<s%> I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times:<s%> his <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall <S%H8548>continually<s%> be in my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall make her <S%H1984>boast<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> the <S%H6041>humble<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> thereof, and be <S%H8056>glad.<s%>
O <S%H1431>magnify<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with me, and let us <S%H7311>exalt<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
I <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he <S%H6030>heard<s%> me, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4035>fears.<s%>
They <S%H5027>looked<s%> to him, and were <S%H5102>lightened:<s%> and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> were not <S%H2659>ashamed.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H6041>poor<s%> man <S%H7121>cried,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> him, and <S%H3467>saved<s%> him out of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2583>encamps<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him, and <S%H2502>delivers<s%> them.
O <S%H2938>taste<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H2620>trusts<s%> in him.
O <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you his <S%H6918>saints:<s%> for there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4270>want<s%> to them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him.

The <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions<s%> do <S%H7326>lack,<s%> and suffer <S%H7456>hunger:<s%> but they that <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall not <S%H2637>want<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> thing.
<S%H3212>Come,<s%> you <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me: I will <S%H3925>teach<s%> you the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H4310>What<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is he that <S%H2655>desires<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H157>loves<s%> many <S%H3117>days,<s%> that he may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2896>good?<s%>
<S%H5341>Keep<s%> your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> from <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and your <S%H8193>lips<s%> from <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H4820>guile.<s%>
<S%H5493>Depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursue<s%> it.
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are on the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and his <S%H241>ears<s%> are open to their <S%H7775>cry.<s%>
The <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is against them that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of them from the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
The righteous <S%H6817>cry,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>hears,<s%> and <S%H5337>delivers<s%> them out of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7126>near<s%> to them that are of a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and <S%H3467>saves<s%> such as be of a <S%H1793>contrite<s%> <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> are the <S%H7451>afflictions<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5337>delivers<s%> him out of them <S%H3605>all.<s%>
He <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H6106>bones:<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> of them is <S%H7665>broken.<s%>
<S%H7451>Evil<s%> shall <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked:<s%> and they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H816>desolate.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6299>redeems<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants:<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> of them that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him shall be <S%H816>desolate.<s%>
